name: Journey to the Cookiemoon
description:
A small game I created during a Gamejam.

Inspired by Characters from Dead Cell an rogue-lite, Castlevania-inspired action-platformer by Motion Twin and Evil Empire.

You play as the Guillains trying to reach the Cookiemoon.

Sadly as the game was created during a Gamejam you will never reach it, as i only managed to create 2 Levels :(
